page.description: Generate a collection of tables that reference this table.
page.original:
SQL::Schema::TablesReferencing()SyntaxTIL as SQL::TableInfoList = TablesReferencing(Table as SQL::TableInfo)
Argument Description TIL SQL::TableInfoList contains a single Table property that is a collection of the tables that reference the Table argument Table The Table for which the method supplies the referencing tables
DescriptionReturns a set of TableInfo items for tables that reference the table passed in LimitationsExamplesSee AlsoSQL Schema Object, SQL Schema TablesReferencedBy Function
